data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Maryland, United States so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Maryland, United States
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, help the 1,598,895 believers in Maryland to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the state of Maryland to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Maryland, United States honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Brunei Malay, Kedayan people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Brunei Malay, Kedayan people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Brunei Malay, Kedayan people is yours.
Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Maryland, United States.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Maryland, United States to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Maryland, United States to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.
